name: Lightweight All-Wear Hemp Volley Shorts - Men's

features: Made of a lightweight 76% organic cotton/24% hemp blend for a soft, airy feel
Built for comfort with an elastic waistband, a zippered fly, a hidden button-front and an internal drawcord to fine-tune the fit
Two front pockets; two welted, drop-in back pockets, one with a button-through closure
Body: 4.5-oz 76% organic cotton/24% hemp plain weave with an anti-pilling finish. Pocket lining: 3.8-oz 65% recycled polyester/35% organic cotton twill. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
